intro: Oncidium revolutum, commonly known as the curl leaf orchid, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its long, arching stems and clusters of fragrant, yellowish-green flowers with red markings. It thrives in warm, humid environments and requires bright, indirect light for optimal growth. Oncidium revolutum is often cultivated as a decorative plant due to its attractive appearance and relatively easy care requirements.
